hints.content:
On a clock there are two hands. The $\redD{\text{hour hand}}$ is the shorter hand.  The $\blueE{\text{minute hand}}$ is the longer hand.

![A clock shows the short hour hand points to 5. The long minute hand points to 12.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/45a764740b107b33cf6707c08fe70c7abdbda8c9)

$\redD{12}{:}{\blueE{30}}$ is $\blueE{30}$ ticks from $\redD{12}{:}{00}.$

![A clock shows the short hour hand is between 12 and 1. The long minute hand points to 6. Outside the edge of the clock 12 is labeled 0, 1 is labeled 5, 2 is labeled 10, and so on with 11 labeled 55.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/5f4feb37eaa9476d9fddc16271cbf735045012c9)

Notice the hour hand is past $12{:}00$ but not quite to $1{:}00$.

$\redD{6}{:}{\blueE{00}}$ is $\blueE{0}$ ticks from $\redD{6}{:}{00}.$

![A clock shows the short hour hand points to 6. The long minute hand points to 12. Outside the edge of the clock 12 is labeled 0, 1 is labeled 5, 2 is labeled 10, and so on with 11 labeled 55.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/485e25d0bca840baa550412962f47b43bfcbde80)

$\redD{12}{:}{\blueE{00}}$ is $\blueE{0}$ ticks from $\redD{12}{:}{00}.$

![A clock shows the short hour hand points to 12. The long minute hand points to 12. Outside the edge of the clock 12 is labeled 0, 1 is labeled 5, 2 is labeled 10, and so on with 11 labeled 55.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/ab42af9f8a3a7be1bb495bc8cd1f43efa0f321d5)

Here is the completed table:

Time | Clock
- | - | -
$12{:}30$ | ![A clock shows the short hour hand is between 12 and 1. The long minute hand points to 6.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/854130232b1e37bf6bf5c35b5f7dec27ba7564eb)
$6{:}00$ | ![A clock shows the short hour hand points to 6. The long minute hand points to 12.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/3f3bbffe3df3eee168d13a8d1ced9fed79267b32)
$12{:}00$ |![A clock shows the short hour hand points to 12. The long minute hand points to 12.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/536421819122ae3776c04ca58ffa474e0c3a779b)

question.content:
**Match the clocks to the correct time.**

[[â˜ƒ matcher 1]]

right: ![A clock shows the short hour hand points to 6. The long minute hand points to 12.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/854130232b1e37bf6bf5c35b5f7dec27ba7564eb)
![A clock shows the short hour hand is between 12 and 1. The long minute hand points to 6.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/3f3bbffe3df3eee168d13a8d1ced9fed79267b32)
![A clock shows the short hour hand points to 12. The long minute hand points to 12.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/536421819122ae3776c04ca58ffa474e0c3a779b)
